response.job_title: Research Assistant-PhD candidate-Thèse CIFRE chez Ypso-Facto et le LRGP

PhD student in biotechnological processes. CIFRE thesis between Ypso-Facto and LRGP.

Multiscale modeling of a monoclonal antibody production bioprocess for its optimal control.
response.skills: chemical engineering , Process engineering, Biotechnologie, Biotecnología, Ingeniería química, Ingeniería de procesos, Aspen HYSYS, MATLAB, Microsoft Excel, Simulink, C++, Microsoft Office, Management, Aspen Plus, PROII, Visual Basic pour Applications (VBA), Fermentación, Culture de cellules, Culture cellulaire mammifère, Cellules souches

profile_positions.description:
Thèse CIFRE chez Ypso-Facto et le LRGP. PhD in Biotechnology Processes. 
Thesis topic: Multiscale modeling of a monoclonal antibody production bioprocess for its optimal control
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant-Thèse CIFRE chez Ypso-Facto et le LRGP

profile_positions.description: Desarrollo de un modulo de simulación de bioprocesos USP
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
- Identify the different types of existing bioreactor models for animal cell culture and bacterial culture (micro/macrokinetic, compartmentalized models, CFD, etc).
- Analyze the different types of models in terms of: scope, complexity, experimental information needed to determine the associated parameters.  
- Choose a relatively simple type of model that can be used with little experimental information and put it into equations.
- Program the selected model (Fortran).
- Simulate data from the literature with the Fortran code.
profile_positions.title: Engineering internship - Modeling and simulation of bioreactors

company.name: Laboratoire Réactions et Génie des Procédés

profile_positions.description:
Master internship at LRGP in collaboration with Vetbiobank
Improvement in the expansion of canine mesenchymal stromal cells in an agitated bioreactor
profile_positions.title: Master internship-Culture of canine MSCs on microcarriers

education.degree_name: Master 2 (M2)-Génie des procédés et des bio-procédés
education.field_of_study: Génie des procédés et des bio-procédés

company.name: Ypso-Facto
company.description:
At Ypso-Facto, we develop and optimize (bio)processes. We combine industrial experience and scientific expertise with a complementary know-how in (bio)chemistry, process engineering and software development to offer technology enabled services and proprietary software in upstream and downstream.

We provide two complementary approaches:
- Comprehensive software suite for the development, evaluation, and simulation of (bio)processes including: process modeling and simulation, data capture, data analysis, mass balances, techno-economic analysis
- Scientific and technical consulting including: mechanistic modeling, simulation, and expertise for improving yield and productivity, reaching target performances, bringing process understanding and solving technical and scientific challenges

Reach out here on LinkedIn if you would like to learn more - the journey is just starting!

You can also find more information about our services and publications on our website.
🌎 https://www.ypsofacto.com/publications
